unit.name: Legendary Freeblade
unit.description: Once per turn, when you target this model with a stratagem, you may reduce the CP cost of that use of that stratagem by 1CP.

unit.name: Chainbreaker
unit.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly IMPERIUM unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

composition.description: 1 Canis Rex – EPIC HERO Canis Rex is equipped with: las-impulsor; Questoris multi-laser; Freedom’s Hand.

unit.name: Ion Aegis (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly ARMIGER model is within 6" of this model, each time a ranged attack targets that model, it has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

unit.name: Titan Hunter
unit.description: Each time a ranged attack made by this model is allocated to a MONSTER or VEHICLE model, you can re-roll the Damage roll.

composition.description: 1 Knight Castellan This model is equipped with: plasma decimator; 2 shieldbreaker missile launchers; 2 twin meltaguns; twin siegebreaker cannon; volcano lance; titanic feet.

unit.name: Crusader’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, each time that model makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll .

unit.name: Punishing Salvoes
unit.description: In your Movement phase , if this model Remains Stationary , until the end of the turn, ranged weapons equipped by this model have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

composition.description: 1 Knight Crusader This model is equipped with: avenger gatling cannon; heavy flamer; meltagun; thermal cannon; titanic feet.

unit.name: Defender’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, each time an attack is allocated to that model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

unit.name: Selfless Protector
unit.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to an IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Knight Defender model, that model has the Benefit of Cover and a 4+ invulnerable save against that attack.

composition.description: 1 Knight Defender This model is equipped with: conversion beam obliterator; plasma executor; twin incendine combustor; phosphor blaster; titanic feet.

unit.name: Errant’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that model and ranged weapons equipped by that model have the [ASSAULT] ability.

unit.name: Aggressive Assault
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target, add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Knight Errant This model is equipped with: meltagun; thermal cannon; reaper chainsword.

unit.name: Gallant’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that model and each time that model makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll .

unit.name: Martial Pride
unit.description: Each time this unit Consolidates , models in it can move an additional 3" provided your unit can end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

composition.description: 1 Knight Gallant This model is equipped with: meltagun; thunderstrike gauntlet; reaper chainsword.

unit.name: Paladin’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, weapons equipped by that model have the [LETHAL HITS] ability, and melee weapons equipped by that model have the [LANCE] ability.

unit.name: Seasoned Noble
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

composition.description: 1 Knight Paladin This model is equipped with: meltagun; Questoris heavy stubber; rapid-fire battlecannon; reaper chainsword.

unit.name: Mentor (Bondsman)
unit.description: Each time a model affected by this ability makes an attack that targets this model’s quarry, you can re-roll the Wound roll .

unit.name: Exemplar of the Code
unit.description: At the start of the battle, select one unit from your opponent’s army to be this model’s quarry. Each time this model makes an attack that targets its quarry, you can re-roll the Wound roll . Each time this model’s quarry is destroyed, you can select a new unit from your opponent’s army to be its quarry.

composition.description: 1 Knight Preceptor This model is equipped with: las-impulsor; Preceptor multi-laser; reaper chainsword.

unit.name: Ion Aegis (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly ARMIGER model is within 6" of this model, each time a ranged attack targets that model, it has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

unit.name: Thundershock
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , each time you select a target for this model’s thundercoil harpoon, roll one D6 for the target unit and one D6 for each other enemy unit within 6" of the target unit. On a 4+, the unit being rolled for is struck by arcing energies; after resolving all of this model’s attacks against the target unit, each unit struck by arcing energies suffers D3 mortal wounds .

composition.description: 1 Knight Valiant This model is equipped with: conflagration cannon; 2 shieldbreaker missile launchers; thundercoil harpoon; 2 twin meltaguns; twin siegebreaker cannon; titanic feet.

unit.name: Warden’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, weapons equipped by that model have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and ranged weapons equipped by that model have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

unit.name: Thin Their Ranks
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ), that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

composition.description: 1 Knight Warden This model is equipped with: avenger gatling cannon; heavy flamer; meltagun; reaper chainsword.
1 Sir Hekhtur – EPIC HERO Sir Hekhtur is equipped with: Hekhtur’s pistol; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Control Edict
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll .

unit.name: Servo-skull Uplink
unit.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly SKITARII unit that is Battle-shocked and within 6" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

composition.description: 1 Skitarii Marshal This model is equipped with: Mechanicus pistol; control stave.

leader.name: Control Edict
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll .

unit.name: Lord of the Machine Cult
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. If that unit has the ELECTRO-PRIESTS keyword, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

unit.name: Data-spike
unit.description: At the start of the Fight phase , you can select one enemy VEHICLE unit within Engagement Range of this model’s unit and roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds and, until the end of the phase, the Weapon Skill characteristic of melee weapons equipped by that enemy unit is worsened by 1.

composition.description: 1 Tech-Priest Dominus This model is equipped with: macrostubber; volkite blaster; Omnissian axe.

leader.name: Lord of the Machine Cult
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. If that unit has the ELECTRO-PRIESTS keyword, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

unit.name: Galvanic Field
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

unit.name: Defend the Divine Work
unit.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, all models in this model’s unit have a 4+ invulnerable save .

composition.description: 1 Tech-Priest Manipulus This model is equipped with: magnarail lance; Omnissian staff.

leader.name: Galvanic Field
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

unit.name: Acheron’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, at the start of the Fight phase , each enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units with this ability must take a Battle-shock test , subtracting 1 from the result when they do.

unit.name: Searing Flames
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with an Acheron flame cannon. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover .

composition.description: 1 Cerastus Knight Acheron This model is equipped with: Acheron flame cannon; twin heavy bolter; reaper chainfist.

unit.name: Atrapos’ Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, each time that model makes an attack that targets a TITANIC or TOWERING model, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll .

unit.name: Macro-extinction Protocols
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Hit roll . If that target is TITANIC or TOWERING , add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

composition.description: 1 Cerastus Knight Atrapos This model is equipped with: Atrapos lascutter; graviton singularity cannon.

unit.name: Castigator’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, its ranged weapons have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability and the Armour Penetration characteristic of its ranged weapons is improved by 1.

unit.name: Storm of Bolts
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this model is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Cerastus Knight Castigator This model is equipped with: Castigator bolt cannon; tempest warblade.

unit.name: Lancer’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, it is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced .

unit.name: Shock Charge
unit.description: You can target this model with the Tank Shock Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

composition.description: 1 Cerastus Knight Lancer This model is equipped with: Cerastus shock lance.

unit.name: Magaera’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, each time that model makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.

unit.name: Repair Auto-simulacra
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , this model regains up to D3 lost wounds.

composition.description: 1 Questoris Knight Magaera This model is equipped with: lightning cannon; phased plasma-fusil; reaper chainsword.

unit.name: Styrix’s Duty (Bondsman)
unit.description: While a model is affected by this ability, each time that model is selected to shoot or fight, after it has resolved all of its attacks, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that unit must take a Battle-shock test , subtracting one from the test when doing so.

unit.name: Grav-pinned
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, if an enemy INFANTRY unit was hit by one or more of those attacks made with a graviton crusher, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is grav-pinned. While a unit is grav-pinned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that unit.

composition.description: 1 Questoris Knight Styrix This model is equipped with: graviton crusher; volkite chierovile; reaper chainsword.

unit.name: Objective Scouted
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

unit.name: Enhanced data-tether
unit.description: Each time you select the bearer’s unit as the target of a Stratagem , roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

unit.name: Omnispex
unit.description: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

composition.description: 1 Skitarii Ranger Alpha 9 Skitarii Rangers Every model is equipped with: galvanic rifle; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Rad-saturation (Aura)
unit.description: While an enemy unit (excluding VEHICLE units) is within 3" of this unit, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

unit.name: Enhanced data-tether
unit.description: Each time you select the bearer’s unit as the target of a Stratagem , roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

unit.name: Omnispex
unit.description: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

composition.description: 1 Skitarii Vanguard Alpha 9 Skitarii Vanguard Every model is equipped with: radium carbine; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Suppression Protocols
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) hit by one or more of those attacks made with an Armiger autocannon. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Armiger Helverin This model is equipped with: 2 Armiger autocannons; Questoris heavy stubber; armoured feet.

unit.name: Impetuous Glory
unit.description: Each time this model makes a Charge move , until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s reaper chain-cleaver - strike profile, and add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s reaper chain-cleaver - sweep profile.

composition.description: 1 Armiger Warglaive This model is equipped with: Questoris heavy stubber; thermal spear; reaper chain-cleaver.

unit.name: Sunderer of Fortresses
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a VEHICLE , improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 1. If that attack targets a FORTIFICATION , improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 2 instead.

composition.description: 1 Acastus Knight Asterius This model is equipped with: 2 Asterius volkite culverins; karacnos mortar battery; 2 twin conversion beam cannons; titanic feet.

unit.name: Bastion of Firepower
unit.description: Each time this model Remains Stationary , until the end of the turn, ranged weapons equipped by this model have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

composition.description: 1 Acastus Knight Porphyrion This model is equipped with: 2 Acastus autocannons; Acastus ironstorm missile pod; 2 twin magna lascannons; titanic feet.

unit.name: Protection Protocols
unit.description: You can target this unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

composition.description: 1 Armiger Moirax This model is equipped with: graviton pulsar; volkite veuglaire; armoured feet.
